channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Skin A&E
channel.desc: Top dermatologists help members of the public with a range of skin conditions. (S3, ep6).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master
channel.desc: The Young Guns and OGs go head to head for the first time. Team dynamics are put to the test in the first Flash Challenge and basic lettering tattoos push creativity to the limit. (S16, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Duffy Fortner is back for Redemption with some help from Season 6 Ink Master Kruseman. Season 5 Rivals Cris Element and Angel return. (S2, ep7).
